product_name: Avid BB7 Road Mechanical Disc Brake - 160mm Rotor
long_description: The Avid BB7 Road mechanical disc brake delivers powerful braking in a sleek, road-ready design that's impressively easy to set up and adjust. With easily accessible adjustment knobs and an attractive finish, the Avid BB7 disc brake provides stopping power and easy pad alignment. Tri-Align Caliper Positioning System(TM) aligns caliper easily for fast, simple installation and adjustment. Features inboard and outboard pad adjustment knobs, rigid 2-piece forged body and tool-free pad replacement. Integrated cable stop prevents routing cable and housing from entering the brake at odd angles, reducing the possibility of cable drag. Includes a 6-bolt G2 CleanSweep 160mm rotor and sintered brake pads; can be mounted front or rear. Avid BB7 Road mechanical disc brake is optimized for use with short-pull, road style levers (e.g. STI, drop, canti); levers not included. Caliper is 74mm; adapter for 51mm International Standard brake mounts is included.
